00017 package WeBWorK::Debug;
00018 use base qw(Exporter);
00019 use Date::Format;
00020 our @EXPORT = qw(debug);
00021 
00022 =head1 NAME
00023 
00024 WeBWorK::Debug - Print (or don't print) debugging output.
00025 
00026 head1 SYNOPSIS
00027 
00028  use WeBWorK::Debug;
00029  
00030  # Enable debugging
00031  $WeBWorK::Debug::Enabled = 1;
00032  
00033  # Log to a file instead of STDERR
00034  $WeBWorK::Debug::Logfile = "/path/to/debug.log";
00035  
00036  # log some debugging output
00037  debug("Generated 5 widgets.");
00038 
00039 =cut
00040 
00041 use strict;
00042 use warnings;
00043 use Time::HiRes qw/gettimeofday/;
00044 use WeBWorK::Constants;
00045 use WeBWorK::Utils qw/undefstr/;
00046 
00047 ################################################################################
00048 
00049 =head1 CONFIGURATION VARIABLES
00050 
00051 =over
00052 
00053 =item $Enabled
00054 
00055 If true, debugging messages will be output. If false, they will be ignored.
00056 
00057 =cut
00058 
00059 our $Enabled = 0 unless defined $Enabled;
00060 
00061 =item $Logfile
00062 
00063 If non-empty, debugging output will be sent to the file named rather than STDERR.
00064 
00065 =cut
00066 
00067 our $Logfile = "" unless defined $Logfile;
00068 
00069 =item $DenySubroutineOutput
00070 
00071 If defined, prevent subroutines matching the following regular expression from
00072 logging.
00073 
00074 =cut
00075 
00076 our $DenySubroutineOutput;
00077 
00078 =item $AllowSubroutineOutput
00079 
00080 If defined, allow only subroutines matching the following regular expression to
00081 log.
00082 
00083 =cut
00084 
00085 our $AllowSubroutineOutput;
00086 
00087 =back
00088 
00089 =cut
00090 
00091 ################################################################################
00092 
00093 =head1 FUNCTIONS
00094 
00095 =over
00096 
00097 =item debug(@messages)
00098 
00099 Write @messages to the debugging log.
00100 
00101 =cut
00102 
00103 sub debug {
00104     my (@message) = undefstr("###UNDEF###", @_);
00105     
00106     if ($Enabled) {
00107         my ($package, $filename, $line, $subroutine) = caller(1);
00108         return if defined $AllowSubroutineOutput and not $subroutine =~ m/$AllowSubroutineOutput/;
00109         return if defined $DenySubroutineOutput and $subroutine =~ m/$DenySubroutineOutput/;
00110         
00111         my ($sec, $msec) = gettimeofday;
00112         my $date = time2str("%a %b %d %H:%M:%S.$msec %Y", $sec);
00113         my $finalMessage = "[$date] $subroutine: " . join("", @message);
00114         $finalMessage .= "\n" unless $finalMessage =~ m/\n$/;
00115         
00116         if ($WeBWorK::Debug::Logfile ne "") {
00117             if (open my $fh, ">>", $Logfile) {
00118                 print $fh $finalMessage;
00119                 close $fh;
00120             } else {
00121                 warn "Failed to open debug log '$Logfile' in append mode: $!";
00122                 print STDERR $finalMessage;
00123             }
00124         } else {
00125             print STDERR $finalMessage;
00126         }
00127     }
00128 }
00129 
00130 =back
00131 
00132 =cut
